value.title: Maintain Tab Order for Power BI Report

value.title: Power BI Admins Gain My Workspace Access
value.excerpt: During this video, we will check how Power BI Admins can get User's My Workspace Access. Power BI provides secure storage for user data in their "My Workspaces". value.title: Power BI: Dynamic Format String for Measures
value.excerpt: Recently Microsoft launched new Power BI feature - "Dynamic Format String for Measures". With dynamic format strings for measures, you can determine how measures appear in visuals by conditionally applying a format string with a separate DAX expression.
